References

   
Module ChaosClothAsset
Header /Engine/Plugins/ChaosClothAsset/Source/ChaosClothAsset/Public/ChaosClothAsset/CollectionClothFacade.h
Include #include "ChaosClothAsset/CollectionClothFacade.h"

Syntax

class FCollectionClothFacade : public UE::Chaos::ClothAsset::FCollectionClothConstFacade

Remarks

Cloth Asset collection facade class focused on draping and pattern information. Non-const access (read/write) version.
